Package backend.database

Class DataAccess

java.lang.Object
backend.database.DataAccess
Direct Known Subclasses:
CarDataAccess, TripDataAccess, UserDataAccess
public class DataAccess extends Object
This class is used as a top class to access the database.

    • DataAccess

      public DataAccess​(@Nonnull com.google.cloud.firestore.Firestore db, @Nonnull String collectionName)
      Constructor for DataAccess.
      Parameters:
      db - Represents a Firestore Database and is the entry point for all Firestore operations.
      collectionName - The name of the collection to access.

      Parameters:
      fieldData - The data to add to the document.
      Returns:
      The document reference.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If .get() on a future fails.
      InterruptedException - If there is concurrency problem with the database.
